message:
Hello guys, In case you are working/thinking about implementing something interactive with emotional analysis for your users, Affectiva is providing API's and SDKs that can be used for free to analyze user emotions using the camera.

The sdks are available for all platforms and you can check them in the link below.
story: Ramy Wafa shared a link to the group: Egyptian Geeks.
name: Affectiva Developer Portal
caption: developer.affectiva.com
description: Highly-connected devices, interactive technologies and advanced AI systems surround us daily, but as smart as these are, they lack the ability to sense and adapt to human emotions. At Affectiva, our mission is to bring emotional intelligence to the digital world; we are humanizing technology.
